hero.title: Transform Your Business with Intelligent Automation and Cross-Platform Development
hero.subtitle: At AppToLast, we don't just create software; we design the future of your company. We optimize your processes and connect you with your customers through cutting-edge web and mobile solutions. Focus on growth; we'll handle the technology.

missionVision.title: Our Purpose and Future
missionVision.subtitle: We are a strategic ally for companies seeking authentic digital transformation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To be the strategic partner that drives the real modernization and digitalization of companies. We use cutting-edge technologies like Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) to unify development and our own secure backend infrastructure (VPN) to ensure total control. We transform manual processes into efficient automated workflows.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become the industry benchmark in the integration of Artificial Intelligence and intelligent automation. We aspire to a future where companies exploit the full potential of their data through vector databases and MCP protocols, eliminating unnecessary operational burdens.

items.agile: Agile Development (KMP): We centralize logic with Kotlin Multiplatform.
items.automation: Automation (n8n & MCP): Workflow orchestration and connection via Model Context Protocol.
items.data: Data Intelligence: Vector databases for semantic searches and AI.
items.infra: Proprietary Infrastructure: Our own backend on private VPNs for maximum security.

features.title: Why AppToLast?

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: AppToLast is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website apptolast.github.io/apptolast-website/ and use our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact details when you interact with our services, for example, when you fill out a contact form or subscribe to our newsletter.

useOfInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
useOfInformation.content: The information we collect is used to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, to respond to your inquiries, and to send you updates or promotional materials. We may also use this information for internal analytics and research to enhance user experience.

informationSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
informationSharing.content: AppToLast does not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites that are not operated by us. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13 without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@apptolast.com.
